qas.question: What other characteristic of group behavior is needed in a hunter-gatherer society?
What is the basis of a hunting an gathering economy?
Hoarding of resources are important in what societies?
What societies can be described as a "hoarding economy"?

plausible_answers.text: Mutual exchange and sharing of resources

qas.question: What is important in the numerical systems of hunter-gatherer societies?
Not exchanging resources is important in which societies?
Which societies can be described as a "mutual economy"?

context: <b4_0>Mutual exchange and <a0_0>sharing<a0_0/> of resources<b4_0/> (i.e., meat gained from hunting) are important in the economic systems of <b2_0><b3_0><b5_0><b6_0>hunter-gatherer<b6_0/><b5_0/><b3_0/><b2_0/> societies. Therefore, these societies can be described as based on a "<a1_0>gift economy<a1_0/>."
